entry.title: WIND WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 2:00 PM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: 6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:10 PM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northeast 70 km/h gusting to 90. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 2:10 PM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023
